name: add_memory
description: Adds one or more pieces of information to the memory as key-value pairs.

memories.description: A dictionary where keys are the unique labels and values are the messages to be stored.

name: get_memory
description: Retrieves a specific piece of information from memory using its label.

description: Retrieves all items currently stored in memory.

description: Updates an existing piece of information in memory.

message.description: The new information or content to store.
